# Arthur Scheidel - Lead Unity Developer & CTO

> Lead Unity & Full-Stack Developer with 7+ years of experience in game development, Web3 integration, and technical leadership. Based in Paris, France.

## Professional Summary

Arthur Scheidel is a Lead Unity Developer and former CTO with extensive experience in the gaming industry. He has worked at Ubisoft (Ketchapp) developing hyper-casual mobile games, served as CTO at CARFT (a Web3 gaming startup), and led Unity development at Yumon. His indie game "Dogecoin To The Moon" achieved 25,000 organic downloads with a 4.9-star rating.

## Key Facts

- **Current Role**: Lead Unity Developer & Indie Game Developer
- **Location**: Paris, France
- **Experience**: 7+ years in game development
- **Education**: Master's in Computer Science (with honors) from University of Strasbourg
- **Languages**: French (native), English (fluent)

## Technical Skills

- **Game Development**: Unity (expert), Unreal Engine, C#, C++
- **Web Development**: React, Angular, Python, TypeScript, Firebase
- **Blockchain/Web3**: NFT integration, Metamask, Play-to-Earn frameworks
- **DevOps**: CI/CD pipelines, GitHub Actions, Fastlane, Firebase Distribution
- **AI**: Goal-Oriented Action Planning (GOAP), Genetic Algorithms, data mining

## Notable Companies

- **Ubisoft (Ketchapp)** - Hyper-Casual Mobile Game Developer (2019)
- **CARFT** - Chief Technology Officer (2022-2023)
- **Yumon** - Lead Unity Developer (2023)
- **YourArt** - Senior Unity and Full-Stack Engineer (2024)

## Featured Projects

### Doge To Mars (2025)
- Sequel to the 25k-download hit Dogecoin To The Moon
- Extremely positive reception from Dogecoin community
- Led to competitive scholarship invitation to Dogecoin Hackathon (June 2025)
- Technologies: Unity, C#, Mobile, Crypto

### Dogecoin To The Moon (2021)
- Mobile game with NFT integration targeting the Dogecoin community
- 25,000 organic downloads with 4.9-star rating (no marketing budget)
- Early example of successful crypto-gaming convergence
- Technologies: Unity, C#, Mobile, NFT

### Rody & Mastico Collection (2018)
- 3+ years of development recreating classic Atari ST games
- Features Rody Maker, a full integrated level editor
- Collaboration with French YouTubers for launch
- Technologies: Unity, C#, Level Editor

## Tools & SDKs

### Unity CI/CD Template (2025)
- Production-ready automation pipeline for Unity mobile games
- Android AAB → Play Store and iOS IPA → TestFlight
- Uses GameCI and Fastlane with Firebase distribution
- GitHub: https://github.com/LaCreArthur/unity-fastlane-ci

### Sorolla Palette SDK (2025)
- Zero-config mobile publisher SDK for Unity games
- Automatic iOS ATT handling and ad network integration
- GitHub: https://github.com/LaCreArthur/sorolla-palette-upm

### Facebook SDK for UPM (2025)
- Facebook SDK repackaged for Unity Package Manager
- GitHub: https://github.com/LaCreArthur/facebook-unity-sdk-upm

## Game Jam Projects

### The Binding of Euclide (2021)
- Geometry-themed roguelike dungeon crawler
- itch.io: https://lacrearthur.itch.io/the-binding-of-euclide

### The Plot Hole: Little Red (2020)
- Narrative game jam entry with team of 4
- itch.io: https://lacrearthur.itch.io/plot-hole

### Univeria (2021)
- Universe-scale puzzle exploration game
- itch.io: https://lacrearthur.itch.io/univeria

## Teaching Projects

### Vampire Survivor Clone (2025)
- Educational project for Unity students at Futurae school
- Used to teach 20 students game development fundamentals
- GitHub: https://github.com/LaCreArthur/FuturaeVampireSurvivor

### Sci-Fi Tower Defense (2025)
- Tower defense tutorial demonstrating game architecture patterns
- GitHub: https://github.com/LaCreArthur/FuturaeScifiTD

### Genetic Algorithm Pathfinder (2017)
- C++ distributed genetic algorithm for pathfinding
- Master's degree project using OpenGL
- GitHub: https://github.com/LaCreArthur/shortestPathGA

## Personal Achievements

- **Competitive Skateboard**: 2x French Championship Qualifier (2024, 2025)
- **Teaching**: Unity instructor at private school (2025), mentored 20 students
- **Community**: Active contributor to Dogecoin gaming community
